name: Blog-Website
description: A full-stack blogging platform where users can read, search, filter, comment, and wishlist blogs. It features Firebase Authentication, JWT security, and responsive design.
challenges: Implementing dynamic search and category filter using MongoDB text index and aggregation. Handling secure user roles for commenting and wishlisting.
future: Add blog like/upvote system, blog editing, author following, and markdown editor for post creation.

name: HobbyHub

challenges: Filtering groups based on logged-in users and managing secure routes with conditional logic based on group ownership.
future: Implement group chat, notifications for events, and location-based filtering.

name: DocTalk-Website
description: DocTalk is a doctor consultation booking platform. Users can view doctors, check availability, and book appointments with smooth animations and secure login.
challenges: Creating a smooth user experience with hover cards and ensuring real-time booking visibility per user.
future: Add prescription upload, appointment history, and real-time chat with doctors.
